description: This file defines several provider classes using ChangeNotifier for state management in a Flutter application. It includes providers for tabs, events, birthdays, and messages, each managing a list or map of relevant data and notifying listeners on updates.

classes.name: TabIndexProvider
classes.description: Manages the index of the currently selected tab using ChangeNotifier.

classes.name: EventsProvider
classes.description: Provides an in-memory list of Event objects with methods to add new events.

classes.name: BirthdaysProvider
classes.description: Provides an in-memory list of Birthday objects with methods to add new birthdays.

classes.name: MessagesProvider
classes.description: Manages in-memory message conversations, allowing sending messages within different conversation IDs.

methods.name: setIndex
methods.description: Updates the selected tab index and notifies listeners.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new Event to the in-memory list.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new Birthday to the in-memory list.

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.description: Adds a message to a specified conversation and notifies listeners.
